title: Iron Man
description: After being held captive, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a suit of armor to become Iron Man.

title: The Incredible Hulk
description: Bruce Banner becomes the Hulk after a failed experiment and is hunted by the military.

title: Iron Man 2
description: Tony Stark faces pressure to share his technology while battling a new enemy.

title: Thor
description: Thor, the god of thunder, is banished to Earth and learns humility.

title: Captain America: The First Avenger
description: Steve Rogers becomes Captain America during World War II.

title: The Avengers
description: Earth's mightiest heroes assemble to stop Loki and the Chitauri invasion.

title: Iron Man 3
description: Tony Stark struggles with PTSD while facing a powerful terrorist known as the Mandarin.

title: Thor: The Dark World
description: Thor must save the Nine Realms from a dark force older than the universe.

title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
description: Captain America uncovers a conspiracy inside S.H.I.E.L.D. while facing a deadly assassin.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy
description: A group of intergalactic criminals must band together to stop a fanatical warrior.

title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
description: The Avengers must stop a rogue AI bent on global destruction.

title: Ant-Man
description: A thief gains the power to shrink and must help his mentor pull off a heist.

title: Captain America: Civil War
description: Political pressure splits the Avengers into opposing factions.

title: Doctor Strange
description: A neurosurgeon discovers the mystic arts after a career-ending accident.

title: Black Panther
description: T'Challa returns to Wakanda to become king and faces a new challenger.

title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
description: Peter Parker tries to balance life as a high school student and superhero.

title: Thor: Ragnarok
description: Thor must escape a gladiator planet to save Asgard from destruction.

title: Avengers: Infinity War
description: The Avengers face their most powerful enemy yet: Thanos.

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: After the devastating events of Infinity War, the Avengers attempt to undo the damage.

title: Spider-Man: Far From Home
description: Peter Parker goes on a school trip and faces new threats.
